question:
[Kenneth] and his son [Kevin] went to look at cars. [Kenneth] ended up buying the Mustang. [Linda] and her brother [Scott] took their mother [Melissa] to see her sister [Morgan]. [Valerie] always goes to the park with her son [Robert] on Saturdays. [Morgan] and [Kenneth] left that evening to go bowling. [John] played chess with his brother [Scott]. [Kevin] loved his granddaughter, [Elizabeth]. [Robert]'s brother, [Darryl], went to get ice cream with his sister, [Elizabeth].
Question: How is [John] related to [Valerie]?
